pullRequest.title: Send if component is root or not. Send FSS update on kernel start
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
FSS component details should include whether or not the component is a root component or not.
WIP: Send FSS update on kernel start.
Why is this change necessary:
How was this change tested:
Added Unit Tests.
Any additional information or context required to review the change:
Checklist:

 Updated the README if applicable
 Updated or added new unit tests
 Updated or added new integration tests
 Updated or added new end-to-end tests

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

beforeCommit.message: Send if component is root or not.

afterCommit.message: Send if component is root or not. Send FSS message on kernel start.

nodes.bodyText:
Can we compute this information in setComponentsToGroupsMapping?
Also it would be slightly more efficient if we use normal loop and break when isRoot is true
